data.comment: The match is underway. Beerschot have kicked-off.
Goal! Yuma Suzuki heads St. Truidense into a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The ref has blown to start the second-half. St. Truidense kick-off.
Marius Noubissi is on a sub for Tom Pietermaat for Beerschot.
In the minute 72, Beerschot make their second substitution with Abdoulie Sanyang replacing Pierre Bourdin.
Mory Konate (St. Truidense) has received a first yellow card.
Buatu (St. Truidense) has received a yellow card from Christof Dierick.
In the minute 77, The home team have replaced Facundo Colidio with Chris Durkin. This is the first substitution made today by Stefaan Van Winckel.
Nelson Balongo is replacing Duckens Nazon for the home team.
Blessing Eleke is replacing Yan Vorogovskiy for Beerschot at Staaien.
That's full-time at Staaien. The final score is 1-0.
